Chinese.Description:
在房间内生成Binah，击败后卡牌自动销毁并给予随机三个正面增益。
技能描述：1.每隔150s触发一次，在随机房间生成锁链，并将抗性提高至10倍，击破锁链可减少抗性。若未在下次触发前解除所有锁链则锁链位置生成对应图标生物，在玩家所在房间生成随机生物。2.每隔一段时间触发一次钥匙攻击，随机瞄准一名玩家途径生物眩晕，如果经过管道则在管道处生成一只随机生物。3.每隔一段时间触发一次妖灵攻击，触发前屏幕闪烁三次，对房间内所有玩家使用妖灵攻击（不穿墙）并造成长时间眩晕。4.常驻效果：随机让生物前往玩家所在房间，封锁业力门，玩家速度减缓

English.BuffName: The eye facing the fear, breaking the cycle
English.Description:
Spawn Binah in the room. After defeating her, the card is automatically destroyed and three random positive buffs are given. 
Skill Description: 1. Triggered once every 150s, chains are generated in random rooms, and resistance is increased to 10 times. Breaking the chains can reduce resistance. If all chains are not removed before the next trigger, the corresponding icon creatures will be generated at the chain position, and random creatures will be generated in the room where the player is. 2. Trigger a key attack every once in a while, randomly aiming at a player and stunning the creature passing through. If passing through a pipe, a random creature will be generated at the pipe. 3. Trigger a fairy attack every once in a while. The screen flashes three times before triggering. Use demon attacks on all players in the room (not through walls) and cause long-term stun. 4. Permanent effect: Randomly let the creature go to the player's room, block the karma portal, and slow down the player's speed
